changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_skills') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_skills GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_skills @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT skill_code FROM dbo.Guild_Skills WHERE guild_id = @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_skills') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_skills GO
